<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Spore Sap](/Equipment.aspx?ID=647)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fungus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=77" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 1,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Sap](/Weapons.aspx?ID=37)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This flexible _+2 striking [sap](/Weapons.aspx?ID=37)_ is crafted from the stalks of cave fungi and bound around a mesh of spore-infused gills. Demon-worshipping [xulgaths](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=102) use _spore saps_ to capture spellcasters alive for later sacrifice.

<document level="2" id="action-498" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Spore Sap
